article_title: 3-vehicle crash at Santa Fe and Oxford causing traffic backups – The Denver Post
article_text:
SHERIDAN — Three vehicles were involved in a crash at South Santa Fe Drive and West Oxford Avenue in Sheridan Sunday morning.

An SUV was wedged behind a red truck and partially on top of a gold sedan.

Police have not said if anyone was seriously injured in the crash.

This is a developing story and will be updated as more details become available.

Read the full report at TheDenverChannel.com
